meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical are the same, so remembering the meaning of this kanji is as simple as making sure you know the radical for <radical>enter</radical> first! If you know the radical, you know this kanji means <kanji>enter</kanji> as well.
readingMnemonic: Turns out, after you <kanji>enter</kanji> the tent (remember how the person in the radical is entering one?), you're given a <reading>new</reading> (にゅう) one! Why? No idea, but hey — it's new!
